title: Photos: Best pizza cities
text:
Caption 10. Miami Beach, Fla. TripAdvisor.com 
TripAdvisor.com travelers recommend trying these pizza restaurants: Visa-O1 Extraordinary Pizza, Giotto Maestro della Pizza and Blocks Pizza Deli. 
TripAdvisor.com travelers recommend trying these pizza restaurants: Visa-O1 Extraordinary Pizza, Giotto Maestro della Pizza and Blocks Pizza Deli. (TripAdvisor.com) Caption 9. Phoenix TripAdvisor.com 
TripAdvisor.com readers recommend trying these pizza joints: Pizzeria Bianco, Pomo Pizzeria Napoletana – Phoenix and The Parlor Pizzeria. 
TripAdvisor.com readers recommend trying these pizza joints: Pizzeria Bianco, Pomo Pizzeria Napoletana – Phoenix and The Parlor Pizzeria. (TripAdvisor.com) 
Looking for a quality pie in these here United States? Check out these cities, according to TripAdvisor.com readers/travelers. Loading
